    • cat

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cat​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> a) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Returns:
      (1) cat [OPTION]... [FILE]... : Print contains of this files. (2) cat [FILE_path]... > [destination_File] : copy all contains of files into destination path which created if not exist. (3) cat [FILE_path]... >> [destination_File] : Will append the contents of one file to the end of another file.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • mkdir

      Parameters:
      PaTh -
      bool - (1) mkdir [path] : Create new folder. (2) mkdir [-v] [path] : Show status of this new created folder. (3) mkdir [-v] [-p] [path/newfile/...] : show status of interanl created folder.
